[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Online Food Ordering System (OFOS) enables efficient management of orders, payments, and delivery tracking for a seamless customer experience.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: OFOS supports order placement, payment processing, customer accounts, and real-time delivery tracking.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: OFOS integrates with payment gateways, delivery services, and authentication systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: OFOS offers web and mobile UIs for ease of use by customers, administrators, and managers.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: OFOS supports desktops, laptops, and mobile devices for accessing the system.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: OFOS uses REST APIs for integration with external systems like payment processors and delivery services.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: OFOS sends notifications via email, SMS, and in-app messages for order updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: OFOS optimizes storage for customer data, orders, and delivery information.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: OFOS supports order creation, payment processing, and real-time delivery tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: OFOS customizes notifications and interfaces based on user roles and preferences.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: OFOS integrates with third-party systems for payment processing and order tracking.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: OFOS allows customers to browse menus, place orders, track deliveries, and manage payments.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: OFOS serves customers, administrators, and delivery staff.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: OFOS requires internet access for order placement and tracking.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: OFOS depends on external payment processors and delivery services for order fulfillment.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Delivery: Sending food to the customerâ€™s address.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall allow customers to create orders and set delivery preferences.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall integrate with external payment and delivery services.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow customers to browse menus, place and track orders, and select delivery preferences (REQ-PERF-001, REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall support secure payment processing and real-time order updates (REQ-INTF-002, REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall generate order confirmations and track delivery status in real-time (REQ-FUNC-002, REQ-DB-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive UI for browsing menus, placing orders, and tracking deliveries.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall allow customers to save payment and delivery details for faster checkout.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall provide real-time updates on orders and delivery status within 2 seconds.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store customer data, orders, payment details, and delivery status in a secure database.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall ensure secure user authentication and data storage.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with data protection regulations like GDPR.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall ensure encrypted communication for data protection.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests validate order placement, payment processing, and real-time order tracking features.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User guides and API documentation for integration and usage instructions.
[SEC] 5. References: E-commerce best practices, food delivery system standards, and GDPR.
